headline: Prudent Growth Purchases Rivergate Shopping Center in Indiana
summary: Prudent Growth Partners, LLC, a private equity real estate firm based in Chapel Hill and Charlotte, NC, has completed its $4.4 million acquisition of Rivergate Shopping Center, a 45,314-square-foot shopping center located in Indianapolis, IN.

headline: Telsey Advisory Maintains a Buy Rating on The Kroger Co. (KR)
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) is one of the 13 Most Undervalued Retail Stocks to Buy Right Now. Telsey Advisory analyst Jason Strominger maintained a Buy rating on The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) on June 13 and set a price target of $73.00. The rating was announced before the company releases its fiscal Q1 2025 financial and […]

headline: The Aisle-Prowling Albertsons CEO Taking On Kroger
summary: Susan Morris seeks to cut costs and hold down prices after a court blocked the supermarket chains’ megamerger.

headline: Kroger’s Dividend Growth Prospects Look Bright
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) is one of the best next generation dividend aristocrat stocks. The company’s dividend profile has become increasingly appealing to income-focused investors, with strong potential for continued growth. Over the past five years, The Kroger Co. (NYSE:KR) has doubled its quarterly dividend to $0.32 per share, resulting in a yield of 1.9%. […]
